string.name: name
string.value: A Guard's Fourth Assignment: Discovery of Strange Mushrooms
Looks as if there is another assignment for the #m102000000# Guard. Find out what it is from #b#p1040001##k at the #b#m106000300##k.

#p1040001# says that he's discovered odd Mushrooms just as #p1040000# described. He says that the #o2230101#s are located inside #m105040300# Dungeon in #b#m105050300##k. He wants you to defeat the #r#o2230101#s#k and retrieve the #bPuppet#k...

#o2230131##r #a225311##k
#i4032461# #t4032461# #b#c4032461# / 1#k
You defeated the #o2230101#s. #p1040001# seems worried that #p1040000# is right...
Evan, a phenomenon similar to what #p1040000# described has occurred in #m102000000#. To be specific, it's happening inside #m105040300# Dungeon.
According to some adventurers who were exploring, there is something strange going on with the #r#o2230101#s#k in #b#m105050300##k. I think we're going to have to investigate this. Can you handle it?

Then go into the Sleepywood Dungeon and eliminate about #r100 Annoyed #o2230101#s#k. If this is the same phenomenon that #p1040000# described, you should be able to discover a #bpuppet#k. Please bring it to me.
Huh? This is a part of what a Gaurd must do. Will you still refuse? Hmm...this won't do. This just won't do.
How did things go? Whoa, is that the puppet? It really looks strange...Let me take a closer look.
How could a puppet cause all this...? I guess I should strengthen security around #m102000000#. I'll let you know if anything else happens.
Have you not gone to Sleepywood Dungeon yet? The #r#o2230101#s#k that have become strange are in #b#m105050300##k. Eliminate them and bring back the #bpuppet#k.
Have you not gone to Sleepywood Dungeon yet? The #r#o2230101#s#k that have become strange are in #b#m105050300##k. Eliminate them and bring back the #bpuppet#k.
